word_mean: 风速在短暂时间内，有突然出现忽大忽小变化的风。
风速在短时间内突然出现忽大忽小变化的风。
又称“突风”。大气中小尺度涡流叠加于一般气流上，造成风向、风速时大时小的现象。

sentence.Network_en: As she went past there was a gust of strong perfume.
sentence.Network_cn: 她走过时有一股浓烈的香水味。

sentence.Network_en: A gust of wind pried loose a section of sheet-metal roofing.
sentence.Network_cn: 一阵狂风把铺在屋顶上的一块金属片掀起来了。

sentence.Network_en: A gust of breeze moved down the hillside, ruffling the grass.
sentence.Network_cn: 一阵微风吹下山坡，使青草如波浪起伏。

list.abs: 2. 阵风锋面(gust front) 阵风锋面为风速及/或风向变化的边界。以辐散分析 (divergence analysis)来侦测微爆气流和阵风锋面的发生，.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Old Norse gustr, related to gjósa 'to gush'

entry.def: A gust is a short, strong, sudden rush of wind.

example.ex: A gust of wind drove down the valley...
A hurricane-force gust blew off part of a church tower.
example.tran: 一阵飓风级强风掀掉了教堂塔楼的一角。

entry.def: When the wind gusts, it blows with short, strong, sudden rushes.

example.tran: 风再次猛烈地刮了起来。

example.ex: The wind gusted up to 164 miles an hour.

entry.def: If you feel a gust of emotion, you feel the emotion suddenly and intensely.

sentences.sentence: "the tree was bent almost double by the gust"

auth_sentence.content: Thunderstorms can seed new storms with gust fronts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thunderstorms can seed new storms with gust fronts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thunderstorms can seed new storms with gust fronts.

auth_sentence.content: The fruit is somewhat unpleasant at first gust.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fruit is somewhat unpleasant at first gust.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fruit is somewhat unpleasant at first gust.

auth_sentence.content: But a gust of wind could upset this delicate balance.
auth_sentence.res_content: But a gust of wind could upset this delicate balance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But a gust of wind could upset this delicate balance.

sentences.en: A gust of wind blew the front door shut.
sentences.cn: 一阵大风吹来, 把前门关上了。

sentences.en: A gust of happiness swept through her.
sentences.cn: 一股幸福的暖流流遍她的全身。

sentences.en: The wind gusted up to 45 miles an hour.

jushi.english: A sudden gust of cold wind made me shiver.
jushi.chinese: 一股突然刮来的冷风吹得我打哆嗦。

jushi.english: A gust of wind fluttered the shavings wood.
jushi.chinese: 一阵风把刨花吹得到处乱飞。

jushi.english: The wind will gust up to 50 miles an hour.
